label: Visual Studio Community 2013 Update 5 with Azure Tools 2.9 on Windows Server 2012 R2
displayName: Visual Studio Community 2013 Update 5 with Azure Tools 2.9 on Windows Server 2012 R2
description:
This image of Visual Studio Community 2013 Update 5 with Azure Tools 2.9 enables you to unleash the full power of Visual Studio to develop cross-platform solutions.  Create apps in one unified IDE, and incorporate new languages, features, and development tools into them with Visual Studio Extensions (available in the Visual Studio Gallery).

The Visual Studio software is preinstalled in this VM, but you must acquire a Visual Studio subscription separately which allows you to sign in to and run Visual Studio on this VM.

links.label: Visual Studio subscribers Azure benefit details
